text: Adria Arjona Torres (born April 25, 1992) is an American-Guatemalan actress. She is best known for her role as Emily in the HBO television series True Detective (2015) and as Dani Silva in two episodes of the CBS television series Person of Interest (2014, 2015). In 2018, she starred as Amanda in Life of the Party. She also voices Ramirez in the video game Fortnite. ==Other websites== * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American video game actors Category:Guatemalan people Category:Puerto Rican television actors Category:Puerto Rican voice actors Category:Puerto Rican movie actors
title: Adria Arjona
